content: @Adam Stacoviak, I heard you mention your dnshole.dev project in the pod with Techno Tim, and I'm quite interested in knowing more. Do you have a way for people to subscribe to updates or something?
Or better yet, do you already have anything you can share? :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
There you go, Adam. You already have two potential users, in case you're looking to validate the project. Should be enough, right? :joy:
